content: Yeah, I think I'll give "The Silent Patient" a try. I love a good psychological thriller, and the fact that it's a debut novel makes it even more intriguing. Since I just reorganized my bookshelf, I'm excited to add a new title to my collection. Speaking of which, I also donated around 20 books to the local library last weekend. It felt great to declutter and make some space for new stories and authors.
